p: The total phenolic content (TPC) was determined with the standard Folin-Ciocalteau assay [ 37]. A sample volume of 500 mL was added to 1 mL of distilled water in a 25 mL test tube. A volume of 2.5 mL of Folin-Ciocalteau reagent was added, and after 5 min, a volume of 5 mL of Na 2CO 3 anhydrous solution was added, along with distilled water. Samples were read after 2 h.
